GeeksForGeeks
{{x}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; export interface Item { description: string; done: boolean; } @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'todo'; /* An empty array that is responsible to add a division */ public items = []; /* A two-way binding performed which pushes text on division */ newTask: any; /* When input is empty, it will not create a new division */ public addToList() { if (this.newTask == '') { } else { this.items.push(this.newTask); this.newTask = ''; } } /* This function takes to input the task, that has to be deleted*/ public deleteTask(index) { this.items.splice(index, 1); } }
